categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems laws and acts

nodes.text: Order 99 was a directive for the Separatist Droid Army during the Clone Wars. It was issued during a battle on the planet Bogoa to the B1-Series battle droid Coppertop by Count Dooku, on the orders of Darth Sidious, who sought to test the battle droid's ability to change allegiances as a precursor to the Grand Army of the Republic's own Order 66.
